title: Update job titles from Unreal Engine Developer to Technical Designer across Projects and Resume

requirements.text: In the Projects section, update the title for the Residency project entry from 'Lead Unreal Engine Developer' to 'Lead Technical Designer'.

quotes: change in projects my title from lead unreal engine developer to lead technical designer for the residency

acceptanceCriteria: The Residency project card and/or modal displays 'Lead Technical Designer' instead of 'Lead Unreal Engine Developer'.

requirements.text: In the Projects section, update the title for the Virtual Reality Trainings project entry from 'Unreal Engine Developer' to 'Technical Designer'.

quotes: for virtual reality trainings change my title from unreal engine developer to technical designer

requirements.text: In the Resume section, update the experience entry titled 'Lead Unreal Engine Developer' to 'Lead Technical Designer', keeping all other details (company, dates, description, etc.) unchanged.
